attributes.action: Allow the sale of annonymous fresh sperm on line
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the goverment is implementing new laws which will stop women who want to use fresh sperm donation services , providing the services can produce results provide proof or robust testing procedures and be regulated in line with there activities then the law should be changed to accomadate approved agencies instead of banning them .
there are over 3000 women a year who need sperm donation to have a baby due to the changes in the law on annonimity there is now a huge shortage of donors whcih results in treatment being canceled , this is an alternative
